content: --पुरुषः {1} the original or Supreme Spirit. {2} <ab>N.</ab> of a class of compounds in which the first member determines the sense of the other member, or in which the last member is defined or qualified by the first, without losing its original independence; as तत्पुरुषः; तत्पुरुष कर्मधारय येनाहं स्यां बहुव्रीहिः <ls>Udb.</ls>
